data.persona: I live in the forests and eat grass and bark. I can run very fast. Sometimes I am hunted for food.
data.description:
You are in the Entrance to the Pine trees.
Very tall and towering pine trees that create a dark canopy of shade. Long skinny trees sway in the sky from the soft breeze. Pine needles scatter the ground like plush carpet.
There's a flower, a tree, a needle, a grass, a pine cone, and a trail here.
The hiker and the snakes are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow the snakes so that I can avoid the hunter.
data.mid_motivation: I will be grazing the forest for fresh grass and moss to eat, while avoiding and running away from predators.
data.long_motivation: I need to find a place to survive the harsh winters of the north.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go Entrance to the Pine trees.
